name: asljs-money
description: Lightweight fixed-point Money type and helpers for financial calculations.

scripts.test: npm run build && npm run build:tests && node --test .tests/*.test.js
scripts.test:watch: npm run build && npm run build:tests && node --watch --test .tests/*.test.js
scripts.coverage: npm run build && npm run build:tests && NODE_V8_COVERAGE=.coverage node --test .tests/*.test.js && node -e "console.log('Coverage in .coverage (use c8/istanbul if you want reports)')"

author: Alex Netkachov <alex.netkachov@gmail.com>
